If yes, provide an example where to use it? 8ï¸âƒ£ What happens if you receive browser notifications during test automation execution? 9ï¸âƒ£ Why does Stale Element Exception occur, and how to handle it? ğŸ”Ÿ What is Invalid Certificate Exception?
